pullRequest.title: Control Plane Basic Implementation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This implementation basically covers the basic implementation including the following flow.

Build the maven project using pom.xml. For each component, there will be docker image created. And finally the distribution directory will contain a zip file. Once it is extracted there would be a docker-compose file. The user needs to run docker-compose up
A user init apictl project using an openapi definition (with the wso2 vendor extensions) and then import to the control plane.
Invoke a resource with jwt token obtained from API Manager 3.2.0.

Issues
Fixes #1466
Automation tests

Unit tests added: Yes (partially)
Integration tests added: No

Tested environments

Not Tested

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)

commit.message: docker-maven plugin with maven project for go control plane
Java-filter-chain image creation using docker maven plugin
provide org name for the docker repository
Introduce env variable for mgwHome property, run unit tests prior to the build and  fix the unit test failures
Change the execution order such that tests run before the build
fix the filter-core issues related with merge operation
add simple script to remove the containers

nodes.bodyText: Don't say latest GA release here. we have same issue in our 3xx mgw docker files too

+ENV VERSION=${MG_VERSION}
